text:
Greenhost.nl is hiring! We are a small team (11~) people based in the center of Amsterdam and looking to expand our team. Currently, we are looking for:

* Operations Manager (32-40 hours/week)

* Systems and Network Engineer (32-40 hours/week)

* Virtualization Platform Engineer (32-40 hours/week)

More information about these positions can be found here: https://greenhost.net/about-us/working-at-greenhost/

Please apply by submitting a letter of motivation and curriculum vitae before March 12 2014 to vacancies@greenhost.net.
